mods.title: ShowDamage HealthBar
mods.description: A mod that displays enemy health bars and damage numbers when attacking enemies in the game. All features are fully configurable to suit your preferences.

mods.title: Always Have Magnet Effect
mods.description:
BepInEx plugin to always make rosaries/shards magnet to the player. 
If it isn't obvious to you, that means you will always have the effect. 
Owning or having the charm equipped changes nothing.

mods.title: Stakes of Marika - Rebirth Anywhere
mods.description: A quality-of-life mod inspired by Elden Ring's Stakes of Marika, when you die in a scene, you will respawn at the scene entrance instead of at a bench miles away, making it convenient for quick repeated challenges. Additionally, you can customize respawn points in scenes - after death, you will respawn at the respawn point you set.

mods.title: Relaxed Mode
mods.description:
A collection of balance and quality of life features to make the game more relaxed.


All damage sources deal 1 mask of damage
-1.75x Rosary Beads
-1.5x Shards
-Changing crests, skills and tools can be done at any time and is no longer limited to benches
-Healing only costs a percentage of silk based on missing health (1 mask = 1/3 of spool, 3 masks = full spool)
-Attempting to heal while at full health doesn’t consume silk
-Swift Step (sprint) no longer consumes silk
-Clawline (harpoon) no longer consumes silk
-The Compass works without being equipped (still needs to be bought)
-The Magnetite Brooch works without being equipped (still needs to be bought)
-Ascendant's Grip works without being equipped (lets a player stick to the wall indefinitely)
-Shards always get pulled to the player
-The Quill updates the map without having to rest at a bench
-Removed timers for delivery quests (e.g. Rasher) 
-Increased iframes after receiving damage to 700ms (prevents double environmental damage)
-Maggot effect no longer consumes silk over time, instead requires a full spool to remove (without heal)
-Skip game startup screens

mods.title: Double Shards
mods.description: Doubles the shards (the currency used to craft/repair tools) collected from all sources.

mods.title: No More 2 Damage Plus
mods.description: Reduces all damage taken to just 1 point per hit and prevents rapid multi-hit combos, making Hollow Knight: Silksong significantly more forgiving without removing the challenge.

mods.title: No Bench Restrictions
mods.description: This mod for Hollow Knight: Silksong removes the bench restriction, allowing players to change skills and tools from the inventory menu without needing to sit on a bench. It enhances gameplay flexibility by enabling quick access to abilities and items during exploration or combat.

mods.title: All Enemies Drop Rosary Beads (and shards)
mods.description:
Every enemy drops extra beads according to their max life on killed.

 To be more detailed: the extra bead drop follows the formula: extra bead = floor(max health / [bead ratio]) the "Bead Ratio" in which is 5 by default, and also configurable. Enemies with initial bead drops get even more beads according to their max health, which is also configurable to skip this kind of increment. Config file locates at "<GAME FOLDER>/BepInEx/config/yukkuric.silksong.mod.extra_geo.cfg"

mods.title: One Kill for Journal Entry
mods.description:
BepInEx plugin to fill out a journal entry for an enemy with only one kill.
Because killing something 30 times is just a pain in the ass.
(No mods affect game achievements.)

This does not change the number of kills required! Nothing is retroactive!
All it does is give you all the points (kill counts) needed for that enemy when you kill it!

mods.title: Double Rosaries
mods.description: Doubles the amount of rosaries (currency used to buy items at shops) you pick up

mods.title: Double Silk
mods.description: Doubles silk (MP used for healing and abilities) from all sources

mods.title: Simple Rosary Cheat
mods.description:
Instantly add 1000 rosaries (currency) to your inventory with a single keypress F3
Instantly add 100 Shards to your inventory with a single keypress F4

mods.title: Easy Deliveries - No Delivery Damage On Hit or Fast Travel
mods.description: Delivery items (supplies, queens egg, courier's rasher, etc) will no longer take damage when you get hit or fast travel.

mods.title: Teleport
mods.description:
A simple teleportation mod for Hollow Knight: Silksong.

Core Features:
• 5 Save Slots — Ctrl+1~5 to quick save, Alt+1~5 to quick load
• Teleport Menu — Ctrl+`(tilde) to open teleport UI, unlimited save slots
• Safe Respawn — Alt+6 cycles entry points to escape stuck camera situations
• Bench Teleport — Alt+7 teleports to the last respawn point
• Emergency Rescue — Alt+- teleports to a safe spot; Ctrl+F9 forces return to the main menu
• Controller Support — Fully customizable gamepad scheme
• Audio Feedback — Plays a sound effect when saving

mods.title: Bonfire Teleport
mods.description:
This mod allows you to quickly teleport between unlocked benches. Simply open the map and select the corresponding bench icon to teleport.

Features:
• Quick teleportation between unlocked benches
• Seamless integration with the game's map system
• Easy-to-use interface - just place markers on bench icons
• No complex menus or commands required
• Configurable safety options to prevent quest breaking

mods.title: Increase Player Damage
mods.description: Doubles the damage inflicted by the player. The multiplier can be configured, default is 2.

mods.title: AutoMap
mods.description: Once you have purchased the Quill and the map for an area, automatically updates the map as you move through that area, instead of only updating the map when you rest at a bench. Will not update for areas for which you have not purchased the map.

mods.title: No Double Damage
mods.description: Prevents enemies and normal bosses hits from dealing more than 1 mask of damage
